name: Field of Fire
description:
Project Brief 3 - Field of Fire (Tanky Tanks) Trimester 1 @ SAE Institute
Really enjoyed working on this project over the last few weeks and ended up learning a whole bunch about AI and events! Terrain Inspiration was heavily inspired by Sebastian Lague. I have a few things Id like to fix up in the future such as the Winning / Losing events and the projectile double exploding for some reason lol.
